attributes.description:
USED NISSAN QASHQAI 1.2T TEKNA 5DR CVT A/T 2020 FOR SALE AT FORD CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

Balance of Warranty & Service Plan to be confirmed with Sales Executive.
FEATURES Include: Airbags, Aircon, Alloy Wheels, Auto Head Lights, Central Locking, Cruise Control, Electric Mirrors & Windows, Fog Lights, Leather Interior, Multi-Function Steering, Navigation, Reverse Camera, Radio/CD/MP3 with AUX & USB Port, Bluetooth, Panoramic Roof.


Normal Warranty & Motor Plan applies.
Specific Service Plan applies as specified per vehicle. 
Ford Certified – enquire at the dealership.
T&C’s Apply.

Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
PLEASE NOTE THIS VEHICLE IS AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING AT THE LAZARUS FORD USED CAR SHOWROOM. - ABS, Electronic brakeforce distribution, Auto Windscreen Wipers, Air bags 6, Auto lights, Auto lock, Brake hazard lights, Power steering, Steering adjustment, Cruise control, Onboard computer, Seats 5, Electric mirror fold, Spare wheel NA, Air conditioner, Climate control, Electric windows, Radio, Remote side mirrors, Park distance - rear, Satelite navigation, Alloy wheels, Fuel UNLEADED, Engine TRANSVERSE INLINE 4, Engine size 1197cc, CO2 144g/Km, Power 85kW@5200, Torque 165Nm@1750, DOHC, 4 VALVES PER CYLINDER, Gears 0, Drive 2, 0-100Km/h 12.9sec, Top speed 173Km/h, Boot capacity 430 litres, Average fuel consumption 6.2l/km, Service interval 15000km

Welcome to Cars.Com2, where we sell reliable cars in all price ranges. We aim to provide you with exceptional service, sound financial advice and affordable quality. All our customers can expect the very highest standards of sales and service excellence. Visit our Full Range of vehicles at Please note, advertised sales prices does not include License and Registration fees, nor Dealer Admin Fees.

At our Branch we are proud to introduce for sale this immaculate 2018 Honda Jazz 1.2 Comfort. It features, Aircon, Power Steering, Airbags, Aux, Bluetooth, Radio/CD, USB, Cloth seats, Multifunction Steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Central Locking and Mags.

Nation Wide Delivery 15 years successful track record, trusted dealer with a selection of 50 cars under one roof. First payment in 60 days Everybody knows that Cars.Com2 rules MOTOR TOWN. Enquire now for friendly, professional, efficient and fast service. Its easy to do business with Cars.Com2.
